summary: Muiri with tasteful makeup, recruitable, and with tweaked stats for combat.
descriptionHtml:
I always liked Muiri, but that facepaint always really irritated me, so I removed it. After a few further tweaks to her appearance I found myself sorely missing her pretty face while out adventuring, so I made her recruitable and more combat capable (she is capable of dual wielding).

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/20769-1-1342695621.jpg[/img]

Installation:
Simply extract the files to your Skyrim folder

Notes: If you only want the facial appearance changes, uncheck Muiri.esp


Mods used in screenshots:
Natural Eyes by nevenbridge - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589 (darker eyes)
Cover Eyes by mrLenski - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869 (lighter eyes)
Younger Bretons by Psyke23 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2637
author: Wingwang
